TextView.android:text: Petition for Correction of Clerical/ Typographical Error in the Certificate of Live Birth (COLB), Certificate of Marriage (COM), and Certificate of Death (COD) for R.A. 9048 Services
Filing of petition for persons who have errors in their birth, death & marriage certificate.

- Concerned Petitioner
- Father or Mother
- Relative
- Guardian
- Authorized Person with SPA
1. Certificate of Live Birth (COLB), Certificate of Marriage (COM) Certificate of Death (COD) PSA copy to be corrected (original copy & 2 photocopies)
7. Special Power of Attorney (original copy & 2 photocopies)
12. Certificate of Indigency issued by MSWDO/4P’s & IP’s (original copy & 2 photocopies)
1. Comply and submit the Requirements of Petition for Correction of Clerical/Typographical error in COLB, COM & COD to Receiving Clerk
1.1. Receive\n\n1.2. Verifies, and Prepare the Petition
2. Review and Sign the Petition for Correction of Clerical Error in the COLB, COM & COD
2.1. Let the Costumer Review and Sign the Petition
2.2. Process the Petition, Post for Ten days
3. Pay to the Municipal Treasurer’s Office
3.2. Prepare & process Certificate of Finality for Issuance of COLB, COM & COD with annotation
4. Receive COLB, COM & COD SECPA with annotation
4.1. Release COLB, COM & COD with Annotation
5. Accomplish Client Satisfactory Survey (CSS) and drop it in the feedback box
5.1. Request Client to accomplish Client Satisfactory Survey (CSS) form in the feedback box
Manual on Instructions of Republic Act 9048 and its implementing Rules and Regulations Sec 8. The City/Municipal Civil Registrar are authorized to collect from every petitioner of filing fees.
